ingredients.ingredient: 1 (7 ounce) can chipotle peppers in adobo sauce

cookingTips: Start with one chipotle pepper and add more to taste for heat control
Blend chipotle peppers until smooth for consistent flavor throughout
Chill dip for at least 1 hour before serving to allow flavors to meld
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand how to balance smoky chipotle heat with creamy blue cheese richness and adjust spice levels to preference.
